This website is created using Jekyll with some Bootstrap and Bootswatch. We thank and acknowledge the Allan Lab which made the academic lab template publicly available on which this website is based. More details can be found here.

© 2022 NCL@MICS. Site made with Jekyll and hosted with GitHub Pages.

We are part of the Multifunctional Integrated Circuits and Systems (MICS) group at the Virginia Tech university.
